  • Changelog

Package index

Built-in datasets

ess
An example data frame with data from the European Social Survey, round 6.
issp
An example data frame with data from the International Social Survey Programme (ISSP).
all_labels
A list with all labels available for all occupational schemas
all_schemas
A list with all available translations between occupational schemas.

ESEC-related

Functions the translate to ESEC-related schemas

isco08_to_esec() isco88com_to_esec()
Translate 3-digit ISCO08/ISCO88COM to ESEC
isco08_to_esec_mp() isco88com_to_esec_mp()
Translate 3-digit ISCO08/ISCO88COM to ESEC-MP
isco08_to_eseg()
Translates 2-digit ISCO08 to ESEG.
isco08_to_msec() isco88com_to_msec()
Translate 3-digit ISCO08/ISCO88COM to MSEC
isco08_two_to_esec()
Translate 2-digit ISCO08 to ESEC

EGP-related

Functions the translate to EGP-related schemas

isco88_to_egp() isco68_to_egp()
Translate 4-digit ISCO88/ISCO68 to EGP11/EGP7/EGP5/EGP3
isco88_to_egp_mp() isco68_to_egp_mp()
Translate 4-digit ISCO88/ISCO68 to EGP-MP

Numeric schemas

Functions the translate to schemas which are only numeric such as ISEI.

isco08_to_isei() isco88_to_isei() isco68_to_isei()
Translate 4-digit ISCO08/ISCO88/ISCO68 to ISEI
isco08_to_siops() isco88_to_siops() isco68_to_siops()
Translate 4-digit ISCO08/ISCO88/ISCO68 to SIOPS
isco88_to_mps()
Translate 4-digit ISCO88 to MPS
isco08_to_oep() isco88_to_oep()
Translate ISCO codes to OEP (Occupational Earning Potential)

Other schemas

Functions the translate to other schemas.

isco08_to_microclass()
Translate 4-digit ISCO08 to microclass
isco08_to_isco88() isco68_to_isco88()
Translate 4-digit ISCO08/ISCO68 to ISCO88
isco08_to_oesch() isco88_to_oesch()
Translate 4-digit ISCO08/ISCO88 to OESCH16/OESCH8/OESCH5
isco08_to_ipics() isco88_to_ipics()
Translate 4-digit ISCO08/ISCO88 to IPICS
isco88_to_isco08() isco68_to_isco08()
Translate 4-digit ISCO88/ISCO68 to ISCO08
isco88_to_isco88com()
Translate 4-digit ISCO88 to ISCO88COM
isco88_to_isco68()
Translate 4-digit ISCO88 to ISCO68
isco88_to_ordc()
Translate 4-digit ISCO88 to ORDC
isco88com_to_wright()
Translates 4-digit ISCO88COM to WRIGHT.
esco_to_isco08()
Translate 4-digit ESCO to ISCO08

Utility functions

Utility functions to manipulate ISCO vectors

isco08_swap() isco88_swap() isco68_swap()
Swap ISCO08/ISCO88/ISCO88 between 1, 2, 3 and 4 digit groups
repair_isco()
Repair an ISCO variable
